name: Mystic Miracles - 7 wonders game
description:
Do you like ancient strategy board games ?
Or maybe you played 7 wonders ? In any case you'll love our game.
The game is card-based civilization strategy board game.
It is also online multiplayer for 3-5 people, in which you play with cards, coins, cardboards for 7 wonders and much much more.
The game has two different game play types:
1) Online multiplayer - you play versus real people from all around the world.
2) Play VS Robots - you can play versus computer robots offline.

The game has also amazing graphics and is perfect for your family.
There are three decks in the game and 3 epochs in which players play cards, resolve army conflicts and score points.
Good luck!
